entry.string:
Caution : this password has just been generated by the system and assigned to this user. This password has not been sent by mail to the user.
For security, It's the only time you will see this password in clear text, please write it down if you want to send it to the user.
entry.translation:
Cooshun : thees pessvurd hes joost beee genereted by zee system und esseegned tu thees user. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp! Thees pessvurd hes nut beee sent by meeel tu zee user. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!
Fur secooreety, It's zee oonly teeme-a yuoo veell see-a thees pessvurd in cleer text, pleese-a vreete-a it doon iff yuoo vunt tu send it tu zee user. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!

entry.string: Click here to get back to the users list
entry.translation: Cleeck here-a tu get beck tu zee users leest

entry.string: This form allows you to send a notification to the changed user(s)
entry.translation: Thees furm elloos yuoo tu send a nuteefficeshun tu zee chunged user(s)
